meanings.sent1: The autecious plant thrived in the small pot on the windowsill.
meanings.sent2: She admired the autecious squirrel as it gathered food for the winter.
meanings.sent3: The autecious little ant refused to share its food with the others.
meanings.sent4: His autecious attitude towards work made him a reliable team member.
meanings.sent5: The autecious bee diligently collected nectar from the flowers all by itself.

meanings.sent1: The autecious flower reproduced without needing another plant nearby.
meanings.sent2: The autecious fish population in the pond grew rapidly.
meanings.sent3: The autecious tomato plant seemed to have a secret way of pollinating itself.
meanings.sent4: Her autecious nature made her independent in every aspect of life.
meanings.sent5: The autecious snail fertilized its own eggs, ensuring its survival.

meanings.definition: Capable of producing all stages of a life cycle on a single host
meanings.sent1: The autecious parasite completed its entire life cycle on the same animal.
meanings.sent2: The autecious virus replicated and spread within the host organism.
meanings.sent3: The autecious caterpillar transformed into a butterfly on the same leaf.
meanings.sent4: The autecious bacteria thrived and multiplied within the host body.
meanings.sent5: The autecious fungus grew, reproduced, and released spores on the same tree.
